description.value: With a mighty roar, you invoke the power of the sun itself to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by spending 10 minutes basking within the sun's light or reflecting upon its nature. For 1 focus point, you can use the following divine focus spell: @Compendium[ponyfinder-foundryvtt-module.ponyfinder-spells.Sun's Howl]{Sun's Howl}

value.value: You must worship a god with the sun domain
